import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { FormGroup, ControlLabel, FormControl, Col, Grid, Row, Button, ButtonToolbar, ButtonGroup} from 'react-bootstrap'; export default class AddressDetailsForm extends Component { constructor(props){ this.state={show: true}; } render() { return (

Where do you live, {this.props.values.firstName}?

Street Address: Apt/Unit #: City: State: Have you lived at this address for more than 2 years?
); } }
